title: Define Project Scope and Requirements - AI for Cybersecurity
description: This RFC outlines the objectives of the CybersecurityAI project, focusing on the AI's capabilities for autonomous threat detection, threat mitigation, and potential expansion to other cybersecurity tasks. Detailed technical requirements include machine learning algorithms (e.g., anomaly detection, supervised/unsupervised learning), data collection and analysis methods (e.g., data sources, data preprocessing techniques), performance expectations (e.g., latency, accuracy, scalability), system architecture (e.g., microservices, serverless), integration points with existing security systems (APIs or SDKs), and a roadmap for future development that includes continuous learning and adaptation to emerging threats and vulnerabilities. The AI should be designed to learn from previous incidents and improve its predictions over time.

title: Design AI Architecture
description: Create a detailed design for the AI system that outlines the algorithms, machine learning models, and data structures.

title: Develop AI Models for Threat Detection
description: Build machine learning models capable of identifying cybersecurity threats based on various data sources.

title: Implement Threat Mitigation Strategies
description: Create algorithms for the AI to autonomously mitigate detected cybersecurity threats.
dependencies: Develop AI Models for Threat Detection

title: Design User Interface (Frontend)
description: Create an intuitive and user-friendly interface to allow system administrators to monitor and control the AI's actions.

title: Set Up Database Schema and Integrations
description: Establish the database structure for storing threat data, system logs, and other necessary information.

title: Implement DevOps Practices for Continuous Integration and Deployment
description: Adopt DevOps practices to ensure smooth deployment of updates, improvements, and bug fixes.

title: Conduct Security Audits and Penetration Tests
description: Verify the security of the AI system by performing regular audits and penetration tests.

title: Write Technical Documentation
description: Create comprehensive documentation for developers, administrators, and users to understand the system's functionality.

title: Perform Quality Assurance Testing
description: Execute extensive testing to ensure the system functions as intended and is free of critical bugs.
